            TIMEOUT 120)
    
    add_executable( bsls_bsls_unspecifiedbool "bsls_unspecifiedbool.t.cpp" )
    target_link_libraries( bsls_bsls_unspecifiedbool ${MODULE_NAME}  bsl+bslhdrs bsl+stdhdrs bslalg bsldoc bslh bslim bslma bslmf bslmf bslscm bsls bslmt bsls bsls bslscm bslalg bslma bslmf bsltf bslh bsls bslscm bslma bslmf bsls bslscm bslma bslmf bsltf bsls bslscm bslmf bslscm bslstl bsltf bslx)
    target_include_directories( bsls_bsls_unspecifiedbool PRIVATE ../../bsl ../../bsl/bsl+bslhdrs ../../bsl/bsl+stdhdrs ../../bsl/bslalg ../../bsl/bsldoc ../../bsl/bslh ../../bsl/bslim ../../bsl/bslma ../../bsl/bslmf ../../bsl/bslmt ../../bsl/bsls ../../bsl/bslscm ../../bsl/bslstl ../../bsl/bsltf ../../bsl/bslx .  )
    add_test( bsls_bsls_unspecifiedbool bsls_bsls_unspecifiedbool )
    set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_unspecifiedbool 
        PROPERTIES
        PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "Test passed")
    set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_unspecifiedbool 
        PROPERTIES
        FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "(Exception|Test failed)")
        set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_unspecifiedbool 
            PROPERTIES
            TIMEOUT 120)
    
    add_executable( bsls_bsls_alignedbuffer "bsls_alignedbuffer.t.cpp" )
    target_link_libraries( bsls_bsls_alignedbuffer ${MODULE_NAME}  bsl+bslhdrs bsl+stdhdrs bslalg bsldoc bslh bslim bslma bslmf bslmf bslscm bsls bslmt bsls bsls bslscm bslalg bslma bslmf bsltf bslh bsls bslscm bslma bslmf bsls bslscm bslma bslmf bsltf bsls bslscm bslmf bslscm bslstl bsltf bslx)

    add_test( bsls_bsls_alignedbuffer bsls_bsls_alignedbuffer )
    set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_alignedbuffer 
        PROPERTIES
        PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "Test passed")
    set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_alignedbuffer 
        PROPERTIES
        FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "(Exception|Test failed)")
        set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_alignedbuffer 
            PROPERTIES
            TIMEOUT 120)
    
    add_executable( bsls_bsls_util "bsls_util.t.cpp" )
    target_link_libraries( bsls_bsls_util ${MODULE_NAME}  bsl+bslhdrs bsl+stdhdrs bslalg bsldoc bslh bslim bslma bslmf bslmf bslscm bsls bslmt bsls bsls bslscm bslalg bslma bslmf bsltf bslh bsls bslscm bslma bslmf bsls bslscm bslma bslmf bsltf bsls bslscm bslmf bslscm bslstl bsltf bslx)
    target_include_directories( bsls_bsls_util PRIVATE ../../bsl ../../bsl/bsl+bslhdrs ../../bsl/bsl+stdhdrs ../../bsl/bslalg ../../bsl/bsldoc ../../bsl/bslh ../../bsl/bslim ../../bsl/bslma ../../bsl/bslmf ../../bsl/bslmt ../../bsl/bsls ../../bsl/bslscm ../../bsl/bslstl ../../bsl/bsltf ../../bsl/bslx .  )
    add_test( bsls_bsls_util bsls_bsls_util )
    set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_util 
        PROPERTIES
        PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "Test passed")
    set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_util 
        PROPERTIES
        FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "(Exception|Test failed)")
        set_tests_properties( bsls_bsls_util 
            PROPERTIES
            TIMEOUT 120)
